attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have smoking only venues such as pubs and clubs.  Stop refusing NHS treatment to smokers.  Stop complaining that smokers cost the NHS 1.5 Billion Pounds per year to treat, when this cost is a fraction of the 10 Billion pounds per year contributed by smokers (excise and vat) to the UK economy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
